enb_long_title: Thirty-seventh session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-37)
sentences: This session took place from 6-9 June 2012 in Geneva, Switzerland.
The meeting concluded the Panel's consideration of the recommendations from the IAC Review by approving the functions of the IPCC Secretariat and TSUs, and the Communications Strategy.
Delegates also agreed to revisions to the Procedures for the IPCC Reports, and the Procedures for the Election of the IPCC Bureau and Any Task Force Bureau.
